mapper.sql: id, name, value, use_condition, img, status, effective_time, expire_time, cd_key, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into coupon (id, name, value, use_condition, img, status, effective_time, expire_time, cd_key, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useCondition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{cdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into coupon
id,
name,
value,
use_condition,
img,
status,
effective_time,
expire_time,
cd_key,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update coupon
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
value = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER},
use_condition = #{useCondition,jdbcType=INTEGER},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=DATE},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE},
cd_key = #{cdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update coupon set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value = #{value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, use_condition = #{useCondition,jdbcType=INTEGER}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime,jdbcType=DATE}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE}, cd_key = #{cdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(*) from user_coupon where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select coupon.id, name, value, coupon.use_condition, img, status, effective_time, expire_time, coupon.create_time, coupon.update_time from coupon, user_coupon where user_coupon.user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and coupon.id = user_coupon.coupon_id and coupon.status = 1
select id, name, value, use_condition, img, status, effective_time, expire_time, cd_key, create_time, update_time from coupon where cd_key = #{cdKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
